entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:27 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -37.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Temperature steady near minus 38. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
